introSectionDescription: I’m a software engineer with a passion for continuous learning, personal growth, and building high-quality products that make an impact.
projectionSectionIntro: I have 3 years of full-time experience as a software engineer, plus 9 months as an intern during university. Here’s a breakdown of my journey so far

google.title: Software Engineer
google.description: I work on the Play Monetization team, where I’ve contributed to several cross-functional features involving Android development in Kotlin, frontend web development, and backend API and service design. My role spans the full stack, and I regularly collaborate with other teams to improve monetization flows and user experience.

googleIntern.title: Software Engineer Intern
googleIntern.description: As part of the Google Surveys team, I built a complete frontend interface for survey creation, along with backend APIs for rendering and processing surveys. This project gave me hands-on experience owning a feature end-to-end and collaborating with engineers across the stack.

intuit.title: Software Engineer Intern
intuit.description: I worked on the Data team, where I built data pipelines and ETL processes to analyze user transactions and identify subscription patterns. Additionally, I developed dashboards using SQL and Tableau to surface insights into failed transactions and payment issues.

quibbl.title: Backend Engineer Intern
quibbl.description: Built RESTful backend APIs to support dynamic news content rendering. Also developed a data pipeline to process spreadsheet inputs and import them into a MongoDB database for structured storage and retrieval.

project.introDescription: Kanji Journey is my most recent project. The others were built earlier in my career, but I’ve included them here to showcase the range of technologies and ideas I’ve explored.

kanjiJourney.tagline: A visual study tool to help learners master Japanese kanji by JLPT level.
kanjiJourney.description: Kanji Journey offers interactive features like kanji lookup, progress tracking, note-taking, and self-quizzing. Designed to support efficient and personalized kanji learning through a clean, user-friendly interface.

taskTracker.tagline: A productivity app for organizing tasks by category, with full CRUD functionality.
taskTracker.description: Designed to help users manage their workflow more effectively by categorizing and tracking tasks. Features include task creation, editing, deletion, and real-time updates for a smooth productivity experience.

flack.tagline: A Slack-style messaging app built with Python Flask and vanilla JavaScript
flack.description: Enables real-time messaging with the ability to create and join chat rooms. Built from scratch to explore websocket-based communication and full-stack app architecture.

nba.tagline: A social media platform built with Angular and Django.
nba.description: Allows users to create posts, comment, and engage with content through likes and dislikes. Built to explore user-generated content systems and modern frontend-backend integration.
